com.ingenico.connect.gateway.sdk.java

Interface Connection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, LoggingCapable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PooledConnection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConnection

    public interface Connection
extends Closeable, LoggingCapable
    Represents a connection to the GlobalCollect platform server. Thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Releases any system resources associated with this object.
      Response delete(URI uri, List<RequestHeader> requestHeaders)
      Send a DELETE request to the GlobalCollect platform and return the response.
      Response get(URI uri, List<RequestHeader> requestHeaders)
      Send a GET request to the GlobalCollect platform and return the response.
      Response post(URI uri, List<RequestHeader> requestHeaders, String body)
      Send a POST request to the GlobalCollect platform and return the response.
      Response put(URI uri, List<RequestHeader> requestHeaders, String body)
      Send a PUT request to the GlobalCollect platform and return the response.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ingenico.connect.gateway.sdk.java.logging.LoggingCapable

        disableLogging, enableLogging

           throws IOException

      • get

        Response get(URI uri,
           List<RequestHeader> requestHeaders)
        Send a GET request to the GlobalCollect platform and return the response.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI to call, including any necessary query parameters.
        requestHeaders - An optional list of request headers.
        Throws:
        CommunicationException - when an exception occurred communicating with the GlobalCollect platform

              List<RequestHeader> requestHeaders)

        requestHeaders - An optional list of request headers.

      • post

        Response post(URI uri,
            List<RequestHeader> requestHeaders,
            String body)
        Send a POST request to the GlobalCollect platform and return the response.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI to call, including any necessary query parameters.
        requestHeaders - An optional list of request headers.
        body - The optional body to send.
        Throws:
        CommunicationException - when an exception occurred communicating with the GlobalCollect platform

      • put
